Are you doing a flashback right now?

On 17 Jul 2001, at 21:05, dewboy30816@... wrote:

>  Megaton threw Mustex off his back,but quickly realized he was in no
> condition to take on Megatron, or Mustex. He also realized that if he
> returned to his own time for repairs the trans-warp celll that brought
> him here would not have enough power for him to return. So he made the
> only possible choice and ran. He now had 2 enemies in his own time he
> would have to go after. Mustex(and his son),and Megatron would both
> someday feel his wrath, but for now he needed to be repaired.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex couldn't believe he had been so stupid(or that he had 
> gotten 
> > this far without any complaints). With his sword spinning he jumped
> > on his opponents back, stabbing the blade savagely into his back.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > >  For the first time since he came on line Megaton felt he had 
> > pushed 
> > > his enemy to far. Mustex was fighting so agressively even he felt
> > > fear for his life. Then he saw what blinded by anger Mustex did 
> > not, 
> > > the child was ungaurded. He was barely able to defend let alone
> > > attack, but finally he saw an opening and rushed at the baby.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > >  Mustex became incredibly angry at his desire to attack the 
> > > > defenceless bot.
> > > > Mustex:You monster. I won't let you win.
> > > > Megaton:Like you have any choice.
> > > > Mustex:I WON'T LET YOU WIN!
> > > >  Music from the dragonball z movie "Bardock the Father of Goku" 
> > > from 
> > > > just after Bardocks crew died starts playing(ha ha ha) and 
> Mustex 
> > > > furiously charges at Megaton.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > > > Megaton:I'm Megaton. Learn it well because if you don't get 
> out 
> > > of 
> > > > my 
> > > > > way it will be the sound of your doom. That kid has to much 
> > > > potential 
> > > > > I won't lose my spot as the most powerful bot in the universe.
> > > > >  They continued dueling. Mustex was stronger than in the 
> > > future,but 
> > > > > not as experienced so Megaton had the advantage.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > > > >  Mustex didn't know who this guy was and he didn't care. He 
> > > > grabbed 
> > > > > > the new bot he had dubbed Stallex and jumped out of the 
> way. 
> > He 
> > > > > drew 
> > > > > > his bow.
> > > > > > Mustex:Sword mode.
> > > > > > It straighten into his double-bladded sword and he charged. 
> > The 
> > > > > > creature spat out a sword made of ice, transformed to his 
> > > > freakish 
> > > > > > robot mode, and met him head-on.
> > > > > > Musex:Who are you?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > > > > >  He realized Mustex didn't come out of either pod and 
> must 
> > > have 
> > > > > > been 
> > > > > > > online for sometime. One of the protoforms must have gone 
> > > > > offline. 
> > > > > > > Then he saw the Maximal insignia on Mustex and knew he 
> had 
> > > lost 
> > > > > the 
> > > > > > > protoform. Worse yet the new bot looked like a BABY, it 
> had 
> > > to 
> > > > be 
> > > > > > > weak now, but it could be a formidable opponent in the 
> > future 
> > > > if 
> > > > > it 
> > > > > > > went through the same gradual upgrades as humans. He 
> > wouldn't 
> > > > > allow 
> > > > > > > it to happen. HE was the maost powerful bot in the 
> > universe, 
> > > > and 
> > > > > it 
> > > > > > > would stay that way. He transformed to dragon mode and 
> spit 
> > > > fire 
> > > > > at 
> > > > > > > the 2 bots...
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > OOCHeres a start to the time travel thing, I got him 
> back 
> > > and 
> > > > > set 
> > > > > > > up the
> > > > > > > > conflict, now you can control him for the battle then 
> > I'll 
> > > > > bring 
> > > > > > > him back to
> > > > > > > > the future to continue the story.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > BIC Megaton flew across the Atlantic much like the 
> > Pilgrims 
> > > > > will 
> > > > > > > one day do.
> > > > > > > > He lands on the shore and devises a plan to delete his 
> > > > > > Predacessor 
> > > > > > > Megatron.
> > > > > > > > Two units with the tyrants personality were two to many 
> > but 
> > > > > > > according to the
> > > > > > > > mutants math there was only one to destroy. 
> transforming 
> > to 
> > > > his 
> > > > > > > freakish
> > > > > > > > robot mode from his dragon form cut his size by four. 
> he 
> > > > > scanned 
> > > > > > > the area
> > > > > > > > and found a hidden cave nearby. He needed rest and the 
> > cave 
> > > > > would 
> > > > > > > offer
> > > > > > > > enough concealment.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Once inside the mutant found the cave paintings from a 
> > > > youth,  
> > > > > > from 
> > > > > > > what he
> > > > > > > > could tell the youth was human, a tribe of the useless 
> > > > fleshy, 
> > > > > > weak
> > > > > > > > creatures must have migrated away and left only thier 
> > > > paintings 
> > > > > > to 
> > > > > > > show they
> > > > > > > > were ever there.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Megaton reached out and touched the wall, a sudden 
> charge 
> > > of 
> > > > > > energy 
> > > > > > > forced
> > > > > > > > the large bot away from the wall. He held up his hand 
> and 
> > > > > scanned 
> > > > > > > it for an
> > > > > > > > energy signature only to find nothing had happened to 
> > him. 
> > > > The 
> > > > > > > scanns did
> > > > > > > > reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, sap, 
> > and 
> > > > mud 
> > > > > > had 
> > > > > > > coated
> > > > > > > > his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they were 
> > > drawn 
> > > > > an 
> > > > > > > hour ago
> > > > > > > > instead of  years past.
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > The mutant exited the cave ansd scanned the world. two 
> > pods 
> > > > > > weren't 
> > > > > > > far
> > > > > > > > away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and went 
> to 
> > > > > > > investigate. once
> > > > > > > > nearby he detected animals, three of them. from the 
> looks 
> > > of 
> > > > > > things 
> > > > > > > there
> > > > > > > > was a mother, father and baby. A mighty swing of the 
> > > monsters 
> > > > > > tail 
> > > > > > > remedied
> > > > > > > > the family situation killing the mother (leaving the 
> baby 
> > > and 
> > > > > > > fathers DNA to
> > > > > > > > be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he 
> > > continued 
> > > > > to 
> > > > > > > the pod
> > > > > > > > where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots he 
> > > > > recognized.
> > > > > > > >
